Summary: Overwhelming bright flash appear for about 2-3 seconds.
divs: Sighting DetailsBright flash light for about 2-3 seconds, in Los Angeles. I thought it was going to beging to rain. Though the sky was clear and windy, no rain or thunder. Weird. This is not the first time I see something weird in the sky. About two months ago, I saw an object that flew at a very high speed, it was not an airplane nor a helicopter.
